EmailTemplate.name: Partner Locator.Email 3 - Feb2016
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder â€” Join the Bigcommerce Partner Marketplace
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Did you forget something? Bigcommerce wants to connect you with new clients and merchants through a new and improved partner marketplace feature on Bigcommerce.com. Join the Partner Marketplace by updating your profile on the Partner Portal by March 15th.
For more information, refer to the partnersupport@bigcommerce.com <http://partners.bigcommerce.com/English/Solutions/resources/marketplace_guide.aspx">Partner Marketplace Guide on the Partner Portal, or contact partnersupport@bigcommerce.com.
